Name: Unlock Kimono Cuties
About the game: This game is a casual game. Various interactive items: most items in each scene can be interacted with. Players need to find the correct items in the scene to give to the NPC according to the needs of the NPC. After the NPC's favorability reaches a certain stage, the mini-game will be activated. At this point, the player needs to pass the mini-game to unlock the next level. In the last level, players can select a photo from our preset character image library to generate a custom avatar to replace the character image of the NPC in this level. Instructions: Esc key: main menu; E key: interact with item; C Key: Squat down; W A S D keys: control movement; In the Kyoto alley scene, the space bar is used to bring up the avatar settings.
